Boolean.Name: Suppress Startup Banner
Boolean.Description: Suppresses the display of the startup banner and information messages.

Boolean.Name: Validate Intelli Sense
Boolean.Description: Validates the IntelliSense information after the documentation merger completes.

String.Name: Output Document File
String.Description: Specifies the output document file (.XML) that is merged from all the input document files.

Boolean.Name: Document Library Dependencies
Boolean.Description: If true, project dependencies that output static libraries will have their XML document comment files (.XDC) documented in this project's XML document file.

Boolean.Name: Use Unicode Response Files
Boolean.Description: Instructs the project system to generate UNICODE response files when spawning the xdcmake tool. Set this property to Yes when files in the project have UNICODE paths.
